column4: Does anyone know if (K)ubuntu is better with higher resolutions?
are you sure your monitor supports higher resolutions?
Wastrel: In Windows XP 1024x768 works fine
ok you need to edit your /etc/X11/xorg.conf file.
I added a subsection to display
and went back into prefrences, to try to change the resolution
did you restart the X server in between?
log out & log back in again should work
Ok, tried that and still nothing
now you've got an nvidia card, did you install the nvidia drivers
